name: Crypto Overheat Analyzer
nameJa: 暗号通貨過熱冷却検出
tagline: Detect market cooling signals from price, volume, and open interest
taglineJa: 価格・出来高・建玉から市場の冷却シグナルを検出
description: A backend application for KuCoin Futures that analyzes three data types (price, volume, open interest) to detect overheat cooling signals. Supports configurable timeframes and multiple signal types.
descriptionJa: KuCoin Futures向けのバックエンドアプリケーション。価格・出来高・建玉の3データを分析し、過熱冷却シグナルを検出。タイムフレームと複数シグナルタイプの設定に対応。

features.title: Multi-Signal Detection
features.description: High Zone, Price Weak, Volume Weak, and OI Signal detection
features.descriptionJa: High Zone、Price Weak、Volume Weak、OI Signalの検出

features.title: Cooling Level Classification
features.description: Four levels: confirmed, watch, mild, none
